about_the_game:
Football, Tactics & Glory: World is a football management game tailored for fans of turn-based strategy games.

WHAT MAKES THE GAME SPECIAL?

It combines the most interesting aspects of XCOM and Football Manager. However, it doesn't overwhelm you with boring spreadsheets, millions of numerical values, and decisions that have no significant impact, as is often the case in football management games.

Instead, the game is more akin to a turn-based strategy, where the results depend not on the speed of your reactions but on your ability to plan ahead. It's a game where you build your own squad, gradually getting closer to each of your “fighters”, and where there is an engaging progression system with class and skill choices.

All of this takes place in a vast, living football world, where clubs compete in various tournaments with promotions and relegations, where football players have nationalities with their own unique characteristics, and national teams battle for victory in World Championship.

There are transfers, youth development, club infrastructure improvement, and staff hiring. And for statistics enthusiasts, the game collects and presents many interesting graphs and diagrams in an easy-to-understand format.

I'M NOT A FAN OF FOOTBALL!

Football, Tactics & Glory: World reinvents the basics of the football management genre, making it appealing to everyone, not just the most hardcore football management aficionados. In many reviews, players write that they didn’t like football until they tried our game.

If you appreciate the strategic depth and thoughtful decision-making of turn-based games, Football, Tactics & Glory: World will captivate you. It combines the excitement of football with the strategic elements of building your team and honing their skills.

I WANT REAL CLUBS AND PLAYERS IN THE GAME

We are committed to providing extensive modding support, offering user-friendly editing tools for leagues, teams, and players. As a result, our community will create modifications featuring real kits, logos, and player names as they did for our previous game.

To enable real championships, you will need to subscribe to the appropriate modifications, start a new campaign, and activate all the selected mods in the game settings.

GAME FEATURES

- Unique turn-based match mechanics that can generate new emergent stories even after 100 hours of gameplay.

- Coaching career: clubs offer you job opportunities, and as you complete club tasks, you earn a reputation, attracting the attention of more prestigious clubs.

- Club development involving economics and RPG elements: transfers, loans, the ability to develop young players, infrastructure development, and hiring staff.

- Various career paths: you can start playing with an unknown club and work your way up to the top of world football. Alternatively, you can start the game with a top club and continue its development.

- Extensive statistics with interesting graphs and diagrams.

- Each country has its own gameplay peculiarities.

- Global live football world: AI clubs play matches, develop their team, earn money, and buy/sell players.

- Robust modding support: you can create your own football worlds, from real leagues with real teams and players to fictional universes with unique tournament names and custom leagues.

- Powerful face editor: players are generated with unique faces, but you can customize each face to your liking, making a player resemble yourself or a famous person, for example.

- Hot Seat tournament mode: you can create your own tournament and play a single season with one or multiple friends on the same computer or online using Steam Remote Play Together.

- Unique Twitch integration: viewers can interact with streamers, either assisting or hindering their progress.

DIFFERENCES FROM THE ORIGINAL FOOTBALL, TACTICS & GLORY

  • You are no longer tied to one club as in the original game. You are a coach with your own abilities that improve over time. Other clubs offer you job opportunities, and your reputation rises or falls depending on your team's success. The higher your reputation, the more prestigious clubs will offer you jobs.

  • You can now manage a national team, select the best players from your country, and compete in the World Cup and continental championships.

  • Players have nationalities, which go beyond a mere flag in their profiles. Each country has its own football culture that influences the characteristics of its players. So, playing in Brazil will provide a completely different gaming experience compared to playing in Germany. The same applies to national teams: the characteristics of the players will affect the playing style of the national squads.

  • The game now collects a vast amount of statistics and presents them in a convenient and engaging manner with beautiful graphs and diagrams.

  • The game introduces the Giftedness mechanic, which brings significant changes to team management and match gameplay.

  • The transfer system has been extensively revamped. You can now explore other clubs, directly buy players from clubs, and use a detailed search function across all known clubs. Other clubs also scout your team, and if they find a player they like, they offer a good price for them.

  • You can loan young players to lower-league clubs where they can gain experience they wouldn't get in your team. Additionally, higher-league clubs may offer you the opportunity to loan their young players. This can be very helpful in difficult situations.

  • In addition to the mentioned differences, the new game includes numerous other improvements and changes. These include a redesigned interface, improved AI, and rebalanced elements of the game.

DIFFERENCES FROM MANAGER’S JOURNEY

In the game, you will find significant new mechanics related to the nationalities of footballers and national teams, which led us to rewrite parts of the game engine. As a result, the mechanics of football matches have gained a fresh breath of life, offering new tactics, engaging gameplay situations, and a unique gaming experience that unfolds as you play in different countries.

Here's a brief overview of the key features:

  • Footballers now have nationalities, adding a new layer of depth to their profiles.

  • Each nationality carries its own distinctive trait, influencing the strategy of turn-based matches.

  • National teams have been introduced, participating in continental championships and the World Cup.

  • As a coach, you have the opportunity to lead a national team, personally selecting the finest footballers from your country and competing in prestigious national tournaments.

  • The interface engine has been rewritten. As a result, all screens have been revamped and improved.

  • Customize your coach's appearance using the face editor and clothing editor tools.

  • Experience the coach's reactions displayed through animations during matches.

  • A loan mechanic has been implemented, allowing you to send footballers on loan or receive offers to acquire loaned footballers.

  • An additional continental tournament, ranked third in significance, similar to the League of Conferences, has been added.

  • A dedicated Hot Seat game mode has been introduced: the World Championship.

name: Football, Tactics & Glory: World

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shaders 3.0, minimal resolution 1280 x 768, recommended dedicated graphics card with 1 Gb of RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: XCOM meets Football Manager. Embark on the career of an unknown coach: tactically outsmart opponents in turn-based matches, earn money and experience, search for talented players, manage a club, build your reputation to get invited to lead the national team, and win the World Championship!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
